channel.title: ★Brotown★[24/7|No Lag|PvP|Nether|Towny]
channel.description:
[center][b][size=24pt]Brotown[/size] [/b][/center]
[size=16pt][center]24/7 • No Lag • PvP • Nether • Towny • 50 Slots[/center]
[center][url=http://www.brotown.enjin.com][img]http://imgur.com/czQeO.png[/img][/url][/center]
[center][size=18pt][b]Server IP: Brotown.servercraft.co:7599[/b][/size][/center]
[center][url=http://mcserverstatus.com/index.php?action=viewserver&id=2966][img]http://mcserverstatus.com/2966_1.png[/img][/url][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/f7lV7.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]About Brotown[/b][/center]
Brotown is a 24/7 bukkit based server. Brotown was founded in March 2011 when a former server of mine disbanded. I wanted to continue the legacy of my old server, so i formed Brotown. Named after my two favorite servers, Brotopia and Minetown, it has features and builds from both servers. It has grown significantly from the start, in only two months! We are focused on building huge and epic creations, towns and cities. We are looking to form a strong community enabling players to have a great minecraft experience in general. We currently have PvP, The Nether, and monsters enabled, so be careful in your travels. Trade with players, join towns and factions, and do quests to further utilize the role-playing aspect of this server. Join the server today by filling out the application or by visiting out site.
[size=18pt] [center][url=http://www.brotown.enjin.com]http://www.brotown.enjin.com[/url][/center]
[center][b]Rules[/b][/center]
1. No Griefing. This includes placing blocks, not only destroying them 2. Have Respect for everyone. You never know when someone can help you in return. 3. Use Common Sense. Don't go and build directly at the spawn. Use your 4. Don't Harrass Others. Don't annoy people or kill them for no reason. 5. Listen to Admins. If not, you will be banned. 6. No Cheating or Hacking. This includes flymod, client-side mods, x-ray's, etc. 7. No Stealing. You might get those diamond tools, but you won't be using them when you're banned.
[center][b]How to Apply[/b] [/center]
To apply for building rights on the server, you have to fill out the server application below and post it as a reply to this thread. You can also visit the website to apply.
[code]IGN (Ingame name) Age: Why you want to be a part of Brotown: What do you wish to build here: Will you be playing actively?: Do you agree to the rules and understand that if you do not follow them, you will be banned: Additional Information or pictures (optional): [/code]
[center][b]Notable Plugins[/b][/center]
-Towny - Form towns, create alliances and enemies. Make cities and form nations. -iConomy - Ingame virtual money for trade! -NPCs - Ingame NPCs that talk. -Multiverse - The Nether -War - War Zones where war takes place. Two Gametypes, TDM & CTF
[center][b] Staff [/b][/center]
[Black] [b]Owner[/b] [Black]
Jdwede
[Red] [b]Admins[/b] [Red]
AthlonII240 Kc5222 Chipotlaway ATallWhiteGuy Cupids_Hitman Slam_Pampus
[b]Moderators[/b]
_Jimmy_ Briland neoshady MrHappy59
[center][color=#FF8000] Ventrilo Information [/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/jmIGd.png[/img][/center]
[center]Name: Shadowvault MC[/center] [center]IP: fierce.typefrag.com Port: 18155[/center]
[center]PayPal Donations[/center]
[center][url=https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_donations&business=J2EPL4ARD6NMC&lc=US&item_name=Brotown%20Minecraft%20Server&currency_code=USD&bn=PP%2dDonationsBF%3abtn_donateCC_LG%2egif%3aNonHosted][img]http://i.imgur.com/L6z7p.gif[/img][/url][/center]
This server is run entirely out of the Owner's pocket, so basically it's run by donations! Of course, good deeds never go unrewarded, some of the benefits you can get from donating are listed bellow!

[center]About Brotown[/center]

Brotown is a 24/7 bukkit based server. Brotown was founded in March 2011 when a former server of mine disbanded. I wanted to continue the legacy of my old server, so i formed Brotown. Named after my two favorite servers, Brotopia and Minetown, it has features and builds from both servers. It has grown significantly from the start, in only two months! We are focused on building huge and epic creations, towns and cities. We are looking to form a strong community enabling players to have a great minecraft experience in general. We currently have PvP, The Nether, and monsters enabled, so be careful in your travels. Trade with players, join towns and factions, and do quests to further utilize the role-playing aspect of this server. Join the server today by filling out the application or by visiting out site.

[size=18pt]
[center]http://www.brotown.enjin.com[/center]

[center]Rules[/center]

  1. No Griefing. This includes placing blocks, not only destroying them
  2. Have Respect for everyone. You never know when someone can help you in return.
  3. Use Common Sense. Don’t go and build directly at the spawn. Use your
  4. Don’t Harrass Others. Don’t annoy people or kill them for no reason.
  5. Listen to Admins. If not, you will be banned.
  6. No Cheating or Hacking. This includes flymod, client-side mods, x-ray’s, etc.
  7. No Stealing. You might get those diamond tools, but you won’t be using them when you’re banned.

[center]How to Apply [/center]

To apply for building rights on the server, you have to fill out the server application below and post it as a reply to this thread. You can also visit the website to apply.

IGN (Ingame name) Age: Why you want to be a part of Brotown: What do you wish to build here: Will you be playing actively?: Do you agree to the rules and understand that if you do not follow them, you will be banned: Additional Information or pictures (optional):
